entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain at times heavy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low 8. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
